node.detail_zh: 患者在葵涌碼頭工作，無外遊紀錄，8 月 7 日出現症狀。
node.detail_en: The patient works at Kwai Chung Container Terminal, has no recent travel history, and developed symptoms on August 7.
node.classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

groups.description_zh: 葵涌貨櫃碼頭貨櫃車司機及碼頭的搬運工人群組。患者在不同號碼的碼頭工作，部分患者用同一個休息室，可能在這些休息設施中出現傳播
groups.description_en: The patients - including cargo truck drivers and porters - work at different container terminals, but it is likely that the virus transmission have taken place at shared rest stations.

node.location_en: Wah Ming House, Wah Fu (I) Estate
